channel.title: Arizona's Revolution, its here. ([Officialy] 70%+ from scratch)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/33wtgmg.png[/img] its here....
[IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/4563/zgs.png[/img][IMG]http://img197.imageshack.us/img197/5316/sgs.png[/img][IMG]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/9909/bgsx.png[/img][IMG]http://img21.imageshack.us/img21/8959/agsv.png[/img]
[SIZE=4][b][u]Before anyone says ANYTHING I am one of the admins/coders on Arizona's Revolution, I am NOT the owner.[/u][/b][/SIZE]
[SIZE=4][font=quot]Motivation:
You see, I never got to really play Runescape through a 317 - 480, I got on Runescape the day before Bounty Hunter came out, and I was mad, I had been watching all these awesome videos about rushing, pking DM's and a whole lot more, my motivation that drives me is the fact that I want to be able to bring back all those lost days of rushing, Dm's, castlewars and a whole lot more, for EVERYONE.[/SIZE][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]Goals[/SIZE][/font]
The goals of this server are nothing short of beneficial to everyone who might play this server, Our main goal is to create a fun non delta, non laggy, non richscape, non czar server playable and fun for ALL levels.
[SIZE=4][b][i][u][font=Comic Sans MS]Client[/font][/u][/i][/b][/SIZE]
The client will be based off of CSK client by swat, its a very nice, somewhat clean base and so far i have added:
Hint icons. All headicons(no cheap hacks) Red and white skulls that can be loaded at same time. Cleaned cache. Some models for fircape and dark bow special. Flames Gui(no buttons) new background by KrypticX Fixed login clicking added keys Esc - F11 for hotkeys.
Client preview:
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2z82hio.jpg[/img]
[SIZE=4][b][i][u][font=Comic Sans MS]Game play[/font][/u][/i][/b][/SIZE]
Our development team has been working on making the best gameplay possible, we have made a welcome tour to our server, so when you login you get a tour of the server, no stupid ::help or ::commands. I always hated those and we are NEVER going to have them.
[SIZE=4][b][i][u][font=Comic Sans MS]Mini Games[/font][/u][/i][/b][/SIZE]
Our Mini Games we create to reflect us, we try and make games that are as fun as possible and at the same time playable for ALL levels, not just higher levels.
[b]Duel Arena[/b] - 10%
Dueling is being made from scratch 100% so far we have: [ul][*]Dueling interface working [*]Clicking in chatbox to duel [*]Declining [*]Shoing equipment on the itnerface [*]Dueling "target", the otherplayer dueling with [*]Can only attack your dueling partner[/ul]
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/w8luh3.jpg[/img]
[b] Castle Wars[/b] - 20%
Have what i need just need to put together.
[b]Barrows[/b] - 20%
Have everything just need to start.
[b]Assault [/b]- 0%
Starting Soon.
[b]Pest Control[/b] - 75%
Everything EXCEPT Npc vs. Npc is WORKING. I have the waiting boat with people in boat, the interfaces changing when you get teleported into the game the doors are working, the portals do not wigg out when you hit them. The portals do NOT attack back, the spinners and everything have the right gfx's and death emotes and everything.
[IMG]http://i32.tinypic.com/35aptva.jpg[/img]
[b][i][u][font=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]Pking (Player Killing)[/SIZE][/font][/u][/i][/b]
[font=Courier New][SIZE=3]Melee[/SIZE][/font]
- [b]Perfect Special Attacks[/b]. - 75% * Almost all specials are working liek a beauty i still have to add specials on things like dragon scimitar and hally.
- [b]Max Hit Formula.[/b] - 100% * After searching for about 2 weeks and researching over over the last few days, our tea mhas been able to counculate at least a 95%+ accurate max hit formula that no other server will ever have.
- [b]Timing[/b] - 100% * Timers have been researched over and over again using a frame by frame program from runescape 377 to runescape 525 versions and we have used the timing down to the millisecond, and they are BEAutiful.
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/10rp9c0.jpg[/img]
- [b]Bonus[/b] - 100% * Due to our 'Perfect' Formula and Timing, its obvious the only sensible thing to do was the make our Bonus's as near RuneScape as possible, and we have finished, after 3 long weeks of looking up every item in the Runehq database and adding every single bonus we have projected that they are within 20% of perfection, and unfortunately we cannot spend any more time on this, they are very good.
[font=Courier New][SIZE=3]Range[/SIZE][/font]
- [b]Projectiles[/b] - 100% * One of the most debated and criticized topics in Range is the projectiles, In Az's Rev we have PERFECT projectile speed, slope, angle, even when running, it is just another great feature in Az's Rev.
- [b]Speed & Specials.[/b] - 100% * The Range speed is a very boring issue, however it is very important, going back to melee speeds our team has taken to the time to go frame by frame and they are down to the millisecond.
- [b]Damage Ratio.[/b] - 100% * Much the same to our Melee ratio, after much research we have perfected a Range formula that is better then any known server currently running.
- [b]Bonus, Defence, Armour.[/b] - 100% * I didn't like range very much because i lost my first stake due to my far casting skills were < the range armor he hand on, but now we have made it so it will be just like that.
[font=Courier New][SIZE=3]Magic[/SIZE][/font]
- [b]Spells[/b] - 100% * Magic, this has to be the most underestimated skill I've seen, most servers have it so u splash when u have on full Ahrims and they have on full rune, this is not the case at Az's Rev, our development team has taken time to add every single spell in the game, from wind strike to Teleother Cammy, its there. (ancients too)
[IMG]http://i30.tinypic.com/2h308ls.jpg[/img]
- [b]Projectiles[/b] - 100% * Graphics, what makes Magic so epic? The awesome graphics and flying colors that come with it! haha that's why we have made sure all our graphics, like everything else, is better then any other server seen. We have now added perfect delay projectile when and only when the player is running.
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/hwzg2d.jpg[/img]
- [b]Requirements[/b] - 100% * As magic is seen as the weakest skill in the Combat triangle (Melee, Range, Magic) our team at Az's Rev has jazzed it up, making it a little hard to splash by increasing Magic armor bonus's to hit a little harder, and be a little more effective, only to even up the score for those who wish to be pure mages or use it as a more effective combat tactic.
- [b]Teleports[/b] - 100% * We have so many new game/areas we ill make it so TELEPORTS USE RUNES but do not go to the intended location.
[font=Courier New][SIZE=3]Prayer[/SIZE][/font]
- [b]Prayer System[/b]. - 80% * We have added every single prayer that gives a perfect bonus and switches, prayer from one to the other, we are still working on adding all protection prayers and Smite.
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/1z63y46.jpg[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][i][u][SIZE=4]NPC Combat[/SIZE][/u][/i][/b][/font]
So far I have made a personal base for npc combat, they have their own block emote, attack emote and death emote for EACH npc, we will be adding more as we come across them.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ypg8x.jpg[/img]
- I have now fixed npc gfx masks.(the centering of the gfx on the npc)
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2nvqjjk.jpg[/img]
[font=Comic Sans MS][b][i][u][SIZE=4]Skillz[/SIZE][/u][/i][/b][/font]
[IMG]http://s5.tinypic.com/ftixl0_th.jpg[/img] - 90% Woodcutting has been re-done with a handler all to its self, i hate making stuff in my client so i added a handler, I am almost done adding all trees, the timers and requirements are perfect, just look.
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/se63wh.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://s5.tinypic.com/mjpr8i_th.jpg[/img] - 50% So i have added a very nice base for Firmaking, everything works like a beauty, perfect timing and walking west, level requirments and everything.
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/117rdip.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://s5.tinypic.com/25q6otu_th.jpg[/img] - 100% I have finished our cooking with perfection, researching for this particular topic takes time and patience, I have added full cooking, full burning, interfaces and the whole 9 yards.
I had 99 cooking so i didn't burn 1, but you do burn.
[IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/2jg9jf6.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://s5.tinypic.com/2hs2446_th.jpg[/img] - 100% Arizona's Revolutions fishing is perfect, no flaws, perfect multiple fishes per spot like netting and baiting work, and i took time to add a monkfish spot in the desert. (might make closer) perfection is everything, timers are perfect and so are the emotes, we also have multiple fishes per spot for example trout AND salmon from the same spot due to your level.
Yes I removed the "1"
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/yf1mv.jpg[/img]
[font=quot][b]MEDIA: [IMG]http://i31.tinypic.com/24pb7lj.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/2ivl8va.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i25.tinypic.com/28qzpu9.jpg[/img] [/font]
Will add more progress soon.
Credits: [ul]Me God (real one) My MSN pals (especially Martin)[/ul]

item.title: Arizona's Revolution, its here. ([Officialy] 70%+ from scratch)
item.dc:creator: @_jeba `jeba
item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

I must question your motovation…

If you started a day before BH came out, why would you be mad? Just because someone else was good at pking, who’s to say you wouldn’t of been another one of them 1 item, Rune-2H wielding morons who ran around varrock Dying more times than killing.

I’m not trying to insult you, I’m just curious. Besides, BH was more fun when it was multi, opposed to the BS “1v1/1v5” crap that came after it.

Anyway, looks nice. Goodluck

Read full topic

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363172.msg2824403.html#msg2824403

I know, I wasn’t confused, I was just getting my sig around the forums, I used to hsot a server and I had my website on my profile, but yea, no I didnt need that I was just ating stupid. On top of that, Im not the main coder, Arizona is.

So you’re just the one that tells us that Arizona is developing this?

No, i code it to, hes the main one that like puts it all together. but no Im not just a messenger.
[/quote]
Side programmer, as in: ‘Add these NPC’s.’?[/quote]

More or less help me make methods on how to handler skills without lag and help me make them perfect.

EDIT: dude, get off kid, if you dont even know what a development team is.
